name: Die Alien Scum!
description:
• They are the plague of the galaxy, converting entire planets into volcanic rubble.
  • They are closing on Earth.
  • You are our last line of defence.
  • It's time to fight back!
  • They must be exterminated.

Features:

  • Simple, visceral space-shooter gameplay.
  • Big, loud explosions.
  • Three types of alien fighter.
  • An alien mother-ship.
  • The Fleet-Master boss-ship!
  • Power-ups.
  • High score table.
  • Progressive difficulty.
  • Awesome galactic back-drops.
  • An original soundtrack and powerful sound FX.

Also available for mobile platforms from main mobile app stores.
http://www.diealienscum.com/
